title: Normalization Integration
description: We've integrated the [new normalization standards](https://github.com/adraffy/ensip-15/blob/master/ens-improvement-proposals/ensip-15-normalization-standard.md) into our manager application.

title: V3 Launch
description: We launched the third version of our ens.domains Manager application. For a more detailed overview, please refer to our [blog post](https://mirror.xyz/taytems.eth/0EDU9u4zItawHZdoQmJN0evj7UZLAdYepR1Yz2oADP8)

title: NameWrapper
description: The ENS Name Wrapper contract upgrades new & existing ENS domains by turning them into ERC1155 tokens, which allows for users to have better controls and consistency when working with domains.

title: CCIP Read
description: The integration of  [EIP-3668](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3668), authored by ENS founder Nick Johnson, allows for the next wave of scalability within the ENS ecosystem by allowing users to create full ENS profiles for free off chain.
